alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 1:23PM MST until February 17 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 3 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Rio Verde/Salt River, Superior, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains, San Carlos, Dripping Springs and Globe/Miami. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 3 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Superior
